Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy from Fidel Castro Ruz 
   Havana, September 9 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro Ruz, First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the Council of State and President of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on the occasion of the 58th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
 The floral basket was laid before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the embassy.

Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Chinese Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, was presented with credentials by Chinese Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
 On hand were Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Wu Shumin and Guan Huabing, minister-councilors of the Chinese embassy here, and other embassy officials.     
 After receiving credentials, Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the Chinese ambassador.

Indonesian Parliamentary Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian parliamentary delegation headed by Yoseph Umarhadi, chairman of the Indonesia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group, arrived here Monday.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Kim Wan Su, chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Parliamentary Group, and Bambang Irawan K., charge d' affaires ad interim of the Indonesian embassy here.    
 The DPRK Supreme People's Assembly hosted a reception for the delegation in the evening.

Greetings to Nigerian Foreign Minister
   Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Joy Ogwu on her appointment as foreign minister of Nigeria.
 Expressing the belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would expand through mutual contacts and close cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries, the message wholeheartedly wished her success in carrying out her new work.
